text: Lajos Faragó (3 August 1932 – 13 May 2019) was a Hungarian footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He played for the national team. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1960 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal. He was born in Budapest. Faragó died on 13 May 2019, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lajos Faragó at Sports-Reference.com Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian association football goalkeepers Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: Lajos Faragó
